name: Smart Ameba
tag_list: training, books, videos, technology, flash, zend, php, java, actionscript
overview:
Smart Ameba is a company dedicated to helping technology professionals reach their level. A training and publishing company that understands the unique need for intermediate and advanced learning.

While we are still young, many interesting books are lined up in our pipeline. We are also working to create training classes online and in-person that helps you get up and working quick.

Our special $99 Crash Courses offer training opportunities a la carte, while still delving into the deepest topics be it programming, design, or technology concepts.
